title: Bundle Node.js in Electron app for proper distribution
description:
## Goal
Electron app should work without requiring system Node.js/nvm.

## Best Practice Approach
1. Use electron-builder extraResources to bundle a portable Node.js binary
2. Update frontend/electron/main.ts to use bundled node path when packaged
3. Update electron-builder config in package.json to include Node.js binary

This replaces the PATH hack with a proper bundled solution.

## Best Practice Approach

2. Update frontend/electron/main.ts to use bundled node path when packaged
3. Update electron-builder config in package.json to include Node.js binary

This replaces the PATH hack with a proper bundled solution.
